verbs.description: [ARG0: sacred heart] [V: mourns] [ARG1: death of student] [ARGM-TMP: after eating competition] [ARGM-TMP: sixteen years ago] [ARGM-TMP: when she was 5] caitlin nelson lost her father a port authority police officer in the sept 11 2001 attacks on the world trade center while waiting for help to arrive a nursing student began cpr after realizing nelson pulse was diminished nelson according to her social media profiles and media reports from her hometown was a social work major led campus fundraising efforts and volunteered supporting trauma victims including at sandy hook a candlelight vigil at the school chapel of the holy spirit drew thousands and the university is providing counseling services to students i wish to convey my deepest sympathies to caitlin family friends and to the sacred heart community bridgeport bishop frank caggiano wrote on his facebook page monday caitlin nelson
